remarks: Infinite pigeonhole principle for partitioning an infinite set between finitely many buckets.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 18-Oct-2014.)
statement:
fiphp3d.a $e |- ( ph -> A ~~ NN ) $.
fiphp3d.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. Fin ) $.
fiphp3d.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> D e. B ) $.
fiphp3d $p |- ( ph -> E. y e. B { x e. A | D = y } ~~ NN ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d D y $.
$d ph x y $.
